document.full_text: the boston bruins scored four straight goals and cruised to a lopsided 7-3 win over philadelphia to the chagrin of the fans at the wells fargo center who booed the flyers off the ice saturday.
document.title: bruins ambush flyers in lop-sided series opener
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins scored four straight goals and cruised to a lopsided 7-3 win over philadelphia to the chagrin of the fans at the wells fargo center who booed the flyers off the ice saturday.
